metadata.description: Network Actions event fields for S1QL 2.0 queries

fields.description: IP address of destination for the network request
Port number of destination of the network request
Network event status

Direction of the network connection event. Incoming network connection direction originate from another device to the SentinelOne protected endpoint, while outgoing network connection direction originate from the SentinelOne protected endpoint to another device.
Protocol name per IANA well known ports distribution
Container ID. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
